properties.displayName: DLL Load By System Process From Suspicious Locations
properties.query:
DeviceImageLoadEvents
| where (FolderPath startswith "C:\\Users\\Public\\" or FolderPath startswith "C:\\PerfLogs\\") and InitiatingProcessFolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects when a system process (i.e. located in system32, syswow64, etc.) loads a DLL from a suspicious location or a location with permissive permissions such as "C:\Users\Public"
